message:
Dear {{ expense_approver_name or employee_name}},

The Expense Claim submitted by {{ employee_name }} has been rejected.

You can view the details by clicking the link below:
View Expense Claim

This notification is for your information only. No further action is required.

Regards,
Finance Team
name: Expense Claim Rejection Notification
subject: Expense Claim of {{ employee_name }} Has Been Rejected
